desc.html:
This is an illustration of Metaspriggina swimming above the seabed by two colonies of the cyanobacterium Marpolia.

The seabed photograph traced in this illustration is believed to be in the public domain and to be taken by Petr Kratochvil (source: http://www.publicdomainpictures.net/view-image.php?image=11981).

wiki.Credit:
I made this illustration in Adobe Flash CS4.
Previously published: http://giant-blue-anteater.deviantart.com/art/Metaspriggina-460851420. This version lacks the label at the bottom-right corner.
